    • isValidDateOfBirth

      public static boolean isValidDateOfBirth(String date)
      Checks if argument is in dd/mm/yyyy format and is not in future
      Parameters:
      date - date to check
      Returns:
      true if date is in dd/mm/yyyy format and not in future, false otherwise

    • parseDate

      public static LocalDate parseDate(String date)
      Tries to parse given date
      Parameters:
      date - date to parse, should be in dd/mm/yyyy format
      Returns:
      parsed LocalDate
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException - date in not in dd/mm/yyyy format
